// Subscribe to forest changes
const forest = new Forest({ value: { count: 0 } })

// Subscribe to all changes
const subscription = forest.subscribe((value) => {
  console.log('Forest updated:', value)
})

// Make some changes
forest.next({ count: 1 }) // Logs: "Forest updated: { count: 1 }"
forest.set('count', 2) // Logs: "Forest updated: { count: 2 }"

// Clean up subscription when done
subscription.unsubscribe();
